allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add enhanced structural calculations with cutting optimizer

- Add rebar cutting optimizer with V5 algorithm for Saudi market specs
- Add type definitions for 4 foundation types, 5 slab types, blocks
- Add constants for block sizes, slab types, rebar specifications
- Add enhanced calculation functions for all structural elements
- Update UI components with new slab and block type selectors
- Add Arabic translations for new structural element types

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(projects\): add ProjectShell with grouped navigation UI

Implement a unified shell wrapper for project pages to reduce cognitive
load from 11+ same-level tabs to 4 grouped navigation sections.

New components:
- ProjectShell: Main wrapper with header, navigation, and context toolbar
- ProjectHeader: Displays project name, status, progress, contract value
- ProjectNavigation: Grouped horizontal navigation \(Execution, Finance,
  Planning, Communication, More\) with dropdown submenus
- ProjectContextToolbar: Route-specific action buttons

Changes:
- Add server-side layout.tsx for project routes \(single data fetch\)
- Add shell and commandCenter translation keys \(Arabic/English\)
- Add QA verification checklist documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(do sed -i 's/deleteMutation.mutate\({ id, organizationId }\)/deleteMutation.mutate\({ id, organizationId, costStudyId: studyId }\)/g' "$file")
Bash(pnpm --filter @repo/database exec dotenv -c -e ../../.env -- prisma db push:*)
Bash(cd "H:/Masar/supastarter-nextjs-3" && git checkout -- packages/database/prisma/zod/index.ts && git stash pop 2>&1)
Bash(cd H:/Masar/supastarter-nextjs-3 && npx ts-node --esm packages/database/verify-precision.ts 2>&1 || npx --yes tsx packages/database/verify-precision.ts 2>&1)
Bash(cd "H:/Masar/supastarter-nextjs-3/packages/database" && dotenv -c -e ../../.env -- npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss 2>&1)
